```{r}
library("dplyr")
library("tidyr")
library("readr")
library("ggpubr")
```

```{r}
Crime_data <- read.csv("../Data/Part_1_Crime_Data_.csv") %>%
  select(CrimeDateTime, Location, District, Neighborhood, Longitude, Latitude, Total_Incidents)

Crime_data$date <- as.Date(Crime_data$CrimeDateTime)

Crime_data$time <- format(as.POSIXct(Crime_data$CrimeDateTime), 
                          format = "%H:%M:%S")

Crime_data <- Crime_data %>% select(-CrimeDateTime)

write.csv(Crime_data, file = "../Derived CSVs/clean_crime.csv")
```
